titlestmt.titleproper: Geological map of North America / compiled by the United States Survey in cooperation with the Geological Survey of Canada and Instituto Geologico de Mexico under the supervision of Baily Willis and George W. Stose 1911-1911
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

did.unittitle: Geological map of North America / compiled by the United States Survey in cooperation with the Geological Survey of Canada and Instituto Geologico de Mexico under the supervision of Baily Willis and George W. Stose

scopecontent.p: "To accompany Professional Paper 71, United States Geological Survey."
